backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing access‑controlled user profiles, quizzes, and quiz attempt storage with authentication checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented navigation, authentication, and subscription UI features with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file aggregating short descriptions of all frontend components, pages, hooks, configs, and deployment docs.
frontend/deployment/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST: Deployment checklist detailing steps and routes to verify when deploying the Navy education app.
frontend/deployment/DEPLOYMENT_OUTPUTS_T: Template for recording deployment details including canister IDs, URLs, and metadata.
frontend/deployment/ROUTE_SMOKE_NAV.md: Manual navigation test guide listing all routes and expected UI elements for smoke testing.
frontend/deployment/SMOKE_TEST_CORE_FLOW: Smoke test document outlining verification steps for quizzes, progress, authentication, and profile flows.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based styles defining color tokens, dark mode values, and base layout variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting document metadata and loading the frontend app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main TanStack router with all site routes and renders the RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/AuthNavControl.t: Provides login/logout button logic using Internet Identity and React Query cache handling.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryNav.tsx: Renders the main navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus, subscribe link, and auth controls.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the global page layout including navigation, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralizes site branding info including names and logo asset paths.
frontend/src/games/ShipLogTimelineGame.t: Implements a dragless timeline-ordering game where users arrange Navy history events.
frontend/src/games/SignalFlagsMemoryGame: Implements a memory-matching game using naval signal flags with flip and match logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching quizzes, quiz details, questions, progress, and submitting quiz attempts through an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom theme variables, dark mode styles, base typography, and accessibility-focused utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPoliciesPage.tsx: Renders an informational page describing the site's mission, disclaimers, privacy practices, and data policies.
frontend/src/pages/GamePlayPage.tsx: Displays an individual game based on URL params and renders the corresponding game component or a fallback message.
frontend/src/pages/GamesPage.tsx: Lists available educational games with descriptions and links to play, along with general game guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page introducing the site with navigation to learning content, quizzes, games, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/LearnIndexPage.tsx: Displays a list of learning topics as cards linking to detailed topic pages, using static topic data.
frontend/src/pages/LearnTopicPage.tsx: Renders detailed content and key facts for a selected learning topic based on route params.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Shows user quiz progress, including total attempts, average score, and recent attempts using stored progress data.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPlayPage.tsx: Loads a quiz and handles question navigation, answer selection, scoring, and submitting quiz attempts.
frontend/src/pages/QuizResultsPage.tsx: Displays final quiz score, performance message, and answer review for the completed quiz.
frontend/src/pages/QuizzesPage.tsx: Lists all available quizzes with loading and error states, providing links to start each quiz.
frontend/src/pages/SubscribePage.tsx: React page showing free and premium subscription options with feature lists and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and included plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and project configuration state.
